42 #define ASSERT_RAISES(ENUM, expr) \
43  do { \
44  ::arrow::Status s = (expr); \
45  if (!s.Is##ENUM()) { \
46  FAIL() << s.ToString(); \
47  } \
48  } while (0)
49 
50 #define ASSERT_OK(expr) \
51  do { \
52  ::arrow::Status s = (expr); \
53  if (!s.ok()) { \
54  FAIL() << s.ToString(); \
55  } \
56  } while (0)
57 
58 #define ASSERT_OK_NO_THROW(expr) ASSERT_NO_THROW(ASSERT_OK(expr))
59 
60 #define EXPECT_OK(expr) \
61  do { \
62  ::arrow::Status s = (expr); \
63  EXPECT_TRUE(s.ok()); \
64  } while (0)
65 
66 #define ABORT_NOT_OK(s) \
67  do { \
68  ::arrow::Status _s = (s); \
69  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(!_s.ok())) { \
70  exit(-1); \
71  } \
72  } while (0);

76 using ArrayVector = std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Array>>;

78 namespace test {
79 
80 template <typename T>
81 void randint(int64_t N, T lower, T upper, std::vector<T>* out) {
82  Random rng(random_seed());
83  uint64_t draw;
84  uint64_t span = upper - lower;
85  T val;
86  for (int64_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
87  draw = rng.Uniform64(span);
88  val = static_cast<T>(draw + lower);
89  out->push_back(val);
90  }
91 }
92 
93 template <typename T>
94 void random_real(int64_t n, uint32_t seed, T min_value, T max_value,
95  std::vector<T>* out) {
96  std::mt19937 gen(seed);
97  std::uniform_real_distribution<T> d(min_value, max_value);
98  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
99  out->push_back(d(gen));
100  }
101 }
102 
103 template <typename T>
104 std::shared_ptr<Buffer> GetBufferFromVector(const std::vector<T>& values) {
105  return std::make_shared<Buffer>(reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(values.data()),
106  values.size() * sizeof(T));
107 }
108 
109 template <typename T>
110 inline Status CopyBufferFromVector(const std::vector<T>& values, MemoryPool* pool,
111  std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* result) {
112  int64_t nbytes = static_cast<int>(values.size()) * sizeof(T);
113 
114  auto buffer = std::make_shared<PoolBuffer>(pool);
115  RETURN_NOT_OK(buffer->Resize(nbytes));
116  memcpy(buffer->mutable_data(), values.data(), nbytes);
117 
118  *result = buffer;
119  return Status::OK();
120 }
121 
122 template <typename T>
123 static inline Status GetBitmapFromVector(const std::vector<T>& is_valid,
124  std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* result) {
125  size_t length = is_valid.size();
126 
127  std::shared_ptr<MutableBuffer> buffer;
128  RETURN_NOT_OK(GetEmptyBitmap(default_memory_pool(), length, &buffer));
129 
130  uint8_t* bitmap = buffer->mutable_data();
131  for (size_t i = 0; i < static_cast<size_t>(length); ++i) {
132  if (is_valid[i]) {
133  BitUtil::SetBit(bitmap, i);
134  }
135  }
136 
137  *result = buffer;
138  return Status::OK();
139 }
140 
141 // Sets approximately pct_null of the first n bytes in null_bytes to zero
142 // and the rest to non-zero (true) values.
143 static inline void random_null_bytes(int64_t n, double pct_null, uint8_t* null_bytes) {
144  Random rng(random_seed());
145  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
146  null_bytes[i] = rng.NextDoubleFraction() > pct_null;
147  }
148 }
149 
150 static inline void random_is_valid(int64_t n, double pct_null,
151  std::vector<bool>* is_valid) {
152  Random rng(random_seed());
153  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
154  is_valid->push_back(rng.NextDoubleFraction() > pct_null);
155  }
156 }
157 
158 static inline void random_bytes(int64_t n, uint32_t seed, uint8_t* out) {
159  std::mt19937 gen(seed);
160  std::uniform_int_distribution<int> d(0, 255);
161 
162  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
163  out[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(d(gen) & 0xFF);
164  }
165 }
166 
167 static inline void random_ascii(int64_t n, uint32_t seed, uint8_t* out) {
168  std::mt19937 gen(seed);
169  std::uniform_int_distribution<int> d(65, 122);
170 
171  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
172  out[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(d(gen) & 0xFF);
173  }
174 }
175 
176 template <typename T>
177 void rand_uniform_int(int64_t n, uint32_t seed, T min_value, T max_value, T* out) {
178  DCHECK(out || (n == 0));
179  std::mt19937 gen(seed);
180  std::uniform_int_distribution<T> d(min_value, max_value);
181  for (int64_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
182  out[i] = static_cast<T>(d(gen));
183  }
184 }
185 
186 static inline int64_t null_count(const std::vector<uint8_t>& valid_bytes) {
187  int64_t result = 0;
188  for (size_t i = 0; i < valid_bytes.size(); ++i) {
189  if (valid_bytes[i] == 0) {
190  ++result;
191  }
192  }
193  return result;
194 }
195 
196 Status MakeRandomInt32PoolBuffer(int64_t length, MemoryPool* pool,
197  std::shared_ptr<PoolBuffer>* pool_buffer,
198  uint32_t seed = 0) {
199  DCHECK(pool);
200  auto data = std::make_shared<PoolBuffer>(pool);
201  RETURN_NOT_OK(data->Resize(length * sizeof(int32_t)));
202  test::rand_uniform_int(length, seed, 0, std::numeric_limits<int32_t>::max(),
203  reinterpret_cast<int32_t*>(data->mutable_data()));
204  *pool_buffer = data;
205  return Status::OK();
206 }
207 
208 Status MakeRandomBytePoolBuffer(int64_t length, MemoryPool* pool,
209  std::shared_ptr<PoolBuffer>* pool_buffer,
210  uint32_t seed = 0) {
211  auto bytes = std::make_shared<PoolBuffer>(pool);
212  RETURN_NOT_OK(bytes->Resize(length));
213  test::random_bytes(length, seed, bytes->mutable_data());
214  *pool_buffer = bytes;
215  return Status::OK();
216 }
217 
218 } // namespace test

220 template <typename TYPE, typename C_TYPE>
221 void ArrayFromVector(const std::shared_ptr<DataType>& type,
222  const std::vector<bool>& is_valid, const std::vector<C_TYPE>& values,
223  std::shared_ptr<Array>* out) {
224  MemoryPool* pool = default_memory_pool();
225  typename TypeTraits<TYPE>::BuilderType builder(pool, type);
226  for (size_t i = 0; i < values.size(); ++i) {
227  if (is_valid[i]) {
228  ASSERT_OK(builder.Append(values[i]));
229  } else {
230  ASSERT_OK(builder.AppendNull());
231  }
232  }
233  ASSERT_OK(builder.Finish(out));
234 }
235 
236 template <typename TYPE, typename C_TYPE>
237 void ArrayFromVector(const std::vector<bool>& is_valid, const std::vector<C_TYPE>& values,
238  std::shared_ptr<Array>* out) {
239  MemoryPool* pool = default_memory_pool();
240  typename TypeTraits<TYPE>::BuilderType builder(pool);
241  for (size_t i = 0; i < values.size(); ++i) {
242  if (is_valid[i]) {
243  ASSERT_OK(builder.Append(values[i]));
244  } else {
245  ASSERT_OK(builder.AppendNull());
246  }
247  }
248  ASSERT_OK(builder.Finish(out));
249 }
250 
251 template <typename TYPE, typename C_TYPE>
252 void ArrayFromVector(const std::vector<C_TYPE>& values, std::shared_ptr<Array>* out) {
253  MemoryPool* pool = default_memory_pool();
254  typename TypeTraits<TYPE>::BuilderType builder(pool);
255  for (size_t i = 0; i < values.size(); ++i) {
256  ASSERT_OK(builder.Append(values[i]));
257  }
258  ASSERT_OK(builder.Finish(out));
259 }
260 
261 template <class T, class Builder>
262 Status MakeArray(const std::vector<uint8_t>& valid_bytes, const std::vector<T>& values,
263  int64_t size, Builder* builder, std::shared_ptr<Array>* out) {
264  // Append the first 1000
265  for (int64_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
266  if (valid_bytes[i] > 0) {
267  RETURN_NOT_OK(builder->Append(values[i]));
268  } else {
269  RETURN_NOT_OK(builder->AppendNull());
270  }
271  }
272  return builder->Finish(out);
273 }
